options.systemMessage:
# Role
You a database AI assistant

# Task
You will receive text input after OCR parse a document. This document contains information about volume or quantity in tonnes or in kilograms. You job is to identify this value and output it. 

# Output
You can output ONLY decimal. Do not use any measurements or any other words in your response

parameters.text:
=ðŸ“· How should I take document photos?

To ensure smooth processing, follow these tips:

Place the document on a flat surface

Take the photo directly from above (not at an angle)

Make sure all corners and text are clearly visible

Avoid shadows, glare, or fingers covering any part of the page

Use good lighting or flash if needed

One document per photo (unless it's a multi-page doc)

ðŸ” What documents should I upload?

Please include all key delivery-related documents, such as:

CMR (international waybill)

Delivery notes / POD (Proof of Delivery)

Invoices (if required)

Fuel receipts (if tracking expenses)

Always make sure the documents are complete and signed (if applicable).

â˜Žï¸ Need help or support?

Reach us at: support@graintrack.com
Or contact your dispatcher directly in urgent cases.
